meanings.definition: Punniest (adjective): characterized by making puns or jokes
meanings.sent1: She is the punniest person in our group, always coming up with clever wordplay.
meanings.sent2: The punniest jokes are the ones that make everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent3: His punniest remark had us all giggling uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The punniest minds can turn any situation into a humorous anecdote.
meanings.sent5: Being punniest requires a quick wit and a playful sense of humor.

meanings.definition: Punniest (adverb): in a manner that is the most humorous or clever in making puns
meanings.sent1: She tells jokes punniest, always leaving us in stitches.
meanings.sent2: The comedian delivered his punchlines punniest, earning roaring applause.
meanings.sent3: The punniest, the merrier - laughter is contagious!
meanings.sent4: His humor shines punniest when he incorporates clever puns.
meanings.sent5: Punniest, she can turn even the most serious topic into a comedy show.

meanings.definition: Punniest (noun): the person who is the most skilled at making puns
meanings.sent1: She was crowned the punniest after winning the pun competition.
meanings.sent2: The punniest in the office always keeps the mood light and fun.
meanings.sent3: The punniest at the party had everyone laughing until their sides hurt.
meanings.sent4: Being the punniest requires a knack for wordplay and a love for laughter.
meanings.sent5: The punniest among us can turn any conversation into a playful exchange of puns.
